# This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed
# It is defined by the kaggle/python Docker image: https://github.com/kaggle/docker-python
# For example, here's several helpful packages to load

import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

%matplotlib inline
sns.set()

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# You can write up to 20GB to the current directory (/kaggle/working/) that gets preserved as output when you create a version using "Save & Run All" 
# You can also write temporary files to /kaggle/temp/, but they won't be saved outside of the current session

source.ea7973d7:
Seems Ship transit by Road has low %age of customer receiving product on time.

Also we can see that company is transitting most of its shipment by ship hence it need to focus more on this mode to increase overall avg

source.99888127:
There are no exceptional enteries in Cost of product

Hence considering middle value of cost as Median of cost I.e., '214'

Any payment above '214' is considered to be high payment
source.130c4214:
Assuming that all rating 3 and above are considered nice by company

Giving variable name as "Positive customer response"
source.a16481d3:
57% customer having payment received there delivery on time while 43% cusotmer does not received the delivery on time.

We had calculated the average above that 60% customer from total data got delivery on time Hence we can make a conclution that making payment are getting delay in delivery of product in time

source.c6a95a3f:
60% of the customer is getting delivery on time which is matching the overall avg of on-time delivery of entire data

Not all customer having positive response got Delivery on time, but it is matching with overall avg of product reached on time hence we can say that, faster that product reach to customer better will be customer rating
source.05f5f7ce:
We can see that Product which has high importance level has high %age of product reaching on time.

But Product importancy level medium has high volume hence company need to focus on it to increase overall avg.
